Reviews.Content: hotel indeed terrible hoped comments read tripadvisor saying hotel actually okay wasnt 3star quality staff didnt english hostellike wc disaster decent door neither basic toilet stuff shower gel etc line hostel hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very reasonable 3 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: rzg
Reviews.Content: prior booking hotel quick review frank little scared price options decided sorry folks isnot ritz george excpect tt 3 star hotel major european city hotels par bedroom single reasonable size balcony clean towell wwere daily cleaned daily true bath soap bar toilet paper top toilets water sink bathroom bedroom breakfast reasonable price recommend friends

Reviews.Title: “Good Value, Great Service”
Reviews.Author: PapaTommaso
Reviews.Content: brother stayed hotel attended academic meetings nearby university rome stayed afterwards couple days sightseeing hotel university district life adjoining streets reflects vibrant university atmosphere 1520 minutes walk central district termini convenient metro stops blocks afield hotels furnishings fancy staff unfailingly courteous helpful breakfasts plain filling price 8 days accommodations reasonable enjoyed time hotel athena gladly stay return rome

Reviews.Title: “Just the job”
Reviews.Author: BostonBarney
Reviews.Content: ok picked hotel 2 hours looking online cheap dingy close city centre rome expensive arrival termini station cab hotel €8 bad hotel 67 minutes walk bologna blue line metro stop handy taxi driver stopped corner street cab building front looking hotel cat looks dog anyway door hotel doubles apartment block reception floor hello guy desk info regarding breakfast times keys directions late night 1030 stage double single bed perfectly towels ac tv fridge decent en suite spotlessly clean fault heading rome 3 day action packed tourist weekend sights perfect mean romantic 2 day getaway pick else 45 star market staff friendly knowledgeable usual stuff spend minutes explaining helpful indeed overall 3 day tourist break location staff
